text:
="preserve">Ronald A. Irwin, (October 29, 1936 – December 5, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario. He was a member of the Liberal Party. He was a member of the Canadian Parliament between 1980 to 1984 and again from 1993 to 1997.
Irwin died on December 5, 2020 in Sault Ste. Marie at the age of 84.
